thread.title: Teenage boys ‘shoot 14-year-old girl in the head and rob her after luring her to canal’
thread.title_full: Teenage boys ‘shoot 14-year-old girl in the head and rob her after luring her to canal’

author: yjeffery
title: Teenage boys ‘shoot 14-year-old girl in the head and rob her after luring her to canal’
text:
Comments TWO teenage boys have been charged with shooting a 14-year-old girl in the head after school. 
The teenagers reportedly blasted their victim after luring her to an isolated location by promising to sell her a knife. Facebook 5 Deserae Turner, 14, is currently in hospital in a medically induced coma after being shot in the head 
Deserae Turner, from Amalga, Utah, was reported missing when she did not come home after school on Thursday last week. 
The youngster was found injured in a dry canal in Smithfield, Utah, on Friday. 
She is currently in a medically induced coma in hospital. 
According to local police officers, the two 16-year-old boys lured her to the spot with plans to rob and kill her. 
They have been accused of setting the meeting up with Deserae, who is a student at North Cache Middle School, under the guise of selling her the knife. Facebook The two teenage boys reportedly lured Deserae to a canal in Utah after school, before shooting her and taking her phone and rucksack 
Charging documents claim the teen boys originally planned on stabbing her. 
But after they arrived, one of the teens decided to use a gun he had with him, and blasted the girl in the head, prosecutors said. 
They are also reported to have taken £44 from her purse, thrown her rucksack away and destroyed her phone and iPod. 
According to prosecutors, the teen who brought the gun with him gave the used shell casing to the other youngster when he asked to keep it “as a memento”. 
Cops later found the shell casing on his bedroom windowsill, KSL reports. Teenage boys 'shoot 14-year-old girl Deserae Turner in the head and rob her after luring her to canal' RELATED STORIES ‘I’M A CUB OF THE CALIPHATE’ Horrific ISIS video shows child jihadi tell his story - before shooting a prisoner in the head RESERVOIR THUGS Gangland shooting victim jets back to UK surrounded by heavies after fleeing pram-pushing hitman who ambushed him outside his daughter's primary school SLAUGHTERED ON FACEBOOK Two-year-old boy and man, 26, shot dead and pregnant woman hit in horror shooting on Facebook Live 'No remorse' Thug sent chilling Christmas card from prison to vulnerable gun victim months after shooting her in the neck GUNNED DOWN Gunman on the loose in Sheffield after blasting a man in the chest in street shooting SHOOT OUT Woman, 31, third suspect held after man shot in the head in Hampshire 'doorstep gun attack' ksl.com 5 The youngster was found in a dry canal in Smithfield, Utah, on Friday 
Speaking on behalf of Deserae's family, Jill Parker said: “She is in the fight of her life right now. 
“We know that our Father in Heaven is watching over her and all of us have been touched by her. 
“We know that He hears and answers prayers, and we can see His hand at work as Deserae continues to make progress. 
“We ask that you continue to respect our privacy at this time.” 
The teen who took the shell casing home with him told cops he saw his friend shoot a girl he didn’t know, police said. 
But investigators say text messages sent between the pair suggest they planned the robbery and shooting together. Google Earth 5 The teenager was reported missing after she failed to return home from North Cache Middle School on Thursday last week 
The teenagers have been charged with six counts each, including attempted aggravated murder, robbery and obstruction of justice. 
Friends have started a GoFundMe page to raise money for Deserae's family. 
Writing on the page, Baylee Nikole Hardy said: “Deserae is going through a very hard battle! 
“Every little bit will help their poor family with their ongoing family expenses as they go through this tough battle! 
“Please keep them in your prayers!” ksl.com 5 Cops believe the two 16-year-old boys lured the teen to the spot to rob and kill her
